statement: The README should explicitly map the new domain/platform split (experiments, runs, llm_calls vs providers/rate_limiter/utils) and stage-local workflows to the repo layout so contributors can locate core responsibilities quickly.
rationale: Evidence shows the Convex backend is now organized under domain/ and platform/ with stage-local workflows; the current README still describes the old flat layout.
keyAssumptions: Contributors rely on README for architecture orientation.
validationCriteria: Updated README includes a section that mirrors the current folder layout under packages/engine/convex/domain and /platform.
critiquePoints: Too much detail in README could overwhelm; might need an overview plus link to deeper docs.
questions: Should we include a pointer to packages/engine/convex/README.md or move details there?
